stripped_text: Gain X credits. Draw up to X cards. Install up to X cards in the root of and/or protecting a single remote server. X is equal to the number of agendas in the Runner's score area.
text: Gain X[credit]. Draw up to X cards. Install up to X cards in the root of and/or protecting a single remote server. X is equal to the number of agendas in the Runner's score area.
title: Fast Break
